original_title: Stern action against organisers for conducting New Year festivals with indecent events: Minister
original_body_lines: Stern action would be taken against the organisers who organise indecent events at New Year festivals, Buddhist and Cultural Affairs Minister Vidura Wickramanayake said.
He said a special team is enaged in collecting information on such New Year festival celebration events.
The Buddhist and Cultural Affairs Ministry had received information that New Year festivals that had included indecent events had been held in several places.
